sentences.en: "Have they been to visit you yet?" — "Just the once, yeah."
sentences.cn: “他们来看过你吗?”——“来过,就一次.”

sentences.en: "Once a detective, always a detective," he said lightly.
sentences.cn: “一日为侦探，终生为侦探，”他满不在意地说。

sentences.en: a lot of beans are ready all at once.
sentences.cn: 同时很多豆子准备好了。

sentences.en: all at once the noise stopped.
sentences.cn: 突然，吵闹声停止了。

sentences.en: Any escape, once it's detected, sets off the alarm.
sentences.cn: 一旦发现有泄漏，警报就会响起来。

sentences.en: Everything happened at once. The view of the skyline is at once awesome, grand, and disappointing.
sentences.cn: 所有的事都一起发生了。天边立刻呈现出令人敬畏的、壮丽的和令人沮丧的景色

sentences.en: He once again raised his baton and brought in the brass.
sentences.cn: 他再次举起指挥棒，让铜管乐部加入进来。

sentences.en: He once told an interviewer that he didn't even like rock music.
sentences.cn: 他曾告诉一位采访者，他甚至都不喜欢摇滚乐。

sentences.en: He took off at once and headed back to the motel.
sentences.cn: 他立刻离开，回到汽车旅馆。

sentences.en: I hope you'll forgive me this once.
sentences.cn: 我希望你就原谅我这一次。

sentences.en: I lived there once myself, before I got married.
sentences.cn: 我结婚前曾独自在那儿住过。

sentences.en: I met him only the once, and that was enough.
sentences.cn: 我就见过他那一次，那就让我受够了。

sentences.en: I saw her in a towering rage only once.
sentences.cn: 我只有一次见过她大发雷霆。

sentences.en: I wrote back to Meudon at once to fix up a meeting.
sentences.cn: 我马上给缪顿回信安排会面。

sentences.en: I’ve only met her once.
sentences.cn: 我只见过她一面。

sentences.en: Leave the room at once.
sentences.cn: 马上离开这个房间

sentences.en: once a whinger, always a whinger.
sentences.cn: 曾经是把短刀，始终是把短刀。

sentences.en: Once at Elgin day-trippers visit a number of local sights.
sentences.cn: 一到达埃尔金，一日游的游客就参观了一些当地的风景名胜。

sentences.en: Once I get him a job, he’ll be fine.
sentences.cn: 一旦我帮他找到了工作，他就会好的。

sentences.en: Once in bed, the children usually stay there.
sentences.cn: 孩子们一旦上了床，一般就不下来了。

sentences.en: Paul’s been to Wexford once before.
sentences.cn: 保罗曾去过韦克斯福德一次。

sentences.en: Remove from the heat, add the parsley, toss and serve at once.
sentences.cn: 端离炉子，加上欧芹，颠起翻面后就立刻上桌。

sentences.en: She started once again on the steep upward climb.
sentences.cn: 她又开始沿着陡峭的山路往上爬。

sentences.en: side two contains four once and future hit singles.
sentences.cn: 第二面有四首持续走红的单曲。

sentences.en: side two contains four once and future hit singles.
sentences.cn: 第二面有四首持续走红的单曲。

sentences.en: Sonya and Ida had once been close friends.
sentences.cn: 索尼娅和艾达曾经是很要好的朋友。

sentences.en: The car passed over the body twice, once backward and then forward.
sentences.cn: 那辆车把那人来回轧了两次，先是倒着轧的，再是往前开着轧的。

sentences.en: We tend to meet up for lunch once a week.
sentences.cn: 我们往往每周共进一次午餐。

phrases.phrase: once and for all (或once for all)

trans.tran_cn: 一次，每一次，每隔…一次，曾经

trans.tran_en: from the time when something happens
from the time when something happens
from the time when something happens
